Coming down very fast - 960kb/sec! thanks for sharing mate.
No sound...? Anyone else have that problem? Maybe a codec i need to install?
Oh btw thanks to _Maelstrom_ and everyone seeding, great video quality and great speed!

Sorry no worries I worked out the problem; to anyone planning on joining the two files using VirtualDub (as I did) you might need the lastest DivX Codec Pack. I got this and joining the files then worked, but it also apparently killed the sound on all my .avi files in Win Media Player. So I uninstalled the new DivX, and everything worked fine. Just advice for anyone who wants to do this.

1.4GB (2x700mb) for 98min long (53+45)
as you expect more quality:
A/V: 8/8
IMDB: 8.3
